user_question: How can I train my pet parrot to recite Shakespearean sonnets?
final_answer: Training a parrot to recite Shakespearean sonnets involves consistent repetition, positive reinforcement, and patience. Start with shorter phrases, use treats as rewards, and gradually increase the complexity of the phrases.
